name: Egg Beater
overview: You jump out of bed, ready for your favorite breakfast, scrambled eggs. After opening the fridge, it appears that some of the eggs are a bit strange, even possessed. Egads, Deviled EGGS! Determined to eat, you try to scramble the good eggs while avoiding the bad ones in this arcade nightmare. Published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1989/09 (Issue #75, COMPUTE!'s Gazette Disk Only).
